name: Vec3D
description: The Vec3D class represents a 3D vector with a start point and an end point.
overview:
The `Vec3D` class represents a 3D vector with a start point and an end point. It provides comprehensive functionality for 3D vector mathematics, including basic vector operations, coordinate access, magnitude calculations, directional operations, and rotation calculations. This class extends `Vec2D` to add Z-axis support for full 3D spatial operations.

A `Vec3D` is defined by two 3D points: a start point `(x1, y1, z1)` and an end point `(x2, y2, z2)`. The vector represents the displacement from the start to the end point.

constructors.signature: new Vec3D(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
constructors.description: Creates a new Vec3D with the specified start and end coordinates.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the start point

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the start point

parameters.name: z1
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the start point

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the end point

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the end point

parameters.name: z2
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the end point

constructors.description: Creates a new Vec3D from two Pos3D points.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start position

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end position

methods.name: getX1
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the start point.

methods.name: getY1
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the start point.

methods.name: getZ1
methods.description: Returns the Z coordinate of the start point.

methods.name: getX2
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the end point.

methods.name: getY2
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the end point.

methods.name: getZ2
methods.description: Returns the Z coordinate of the end point.

methods.name: getDeltaX
methods.description: Returns the X component of the vector (x2 - x1).

methods.name: getDeltaY
methods.description: Returns the Y component of the vector (y2 - y1).

methods.name: getDeltaZ
methods.description: Returns the Z component of the vector (z2 - z1).

methods.name: getStart
methods.description: Returns the start point as a Pos3D object.

methods.name: getEnd
methods.description: Returns the end point as a Pos3D object.

methods.name: getMagnitude
methods.description: Returns the magnitude (length) of the vector using Euclidean distance.

methods.name: getMagnitudeSq
methods.description: Returns the squared magnitude of the vector. More efficient than getMagnitude() when only relative comparisons are needed.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds another Vec3D to this vector component-wise.

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: The vector to add

examples:
const offset = new Vec3D(5, 0, 3, 5, 0, 3);
const shifted = vector.add(offset);

methods.name: add
methods.signature: add(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Adds the specified coordinates to both start and end points of this vector.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate to add to start point

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate to add to start point

parameters.name: z1
parameters.description: Z coordinate to add to start point

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate to add to end point

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate to add to end point

parameters.name: z2
parameters.description: Z coordinate to add to end point

methods.name: addStart
methods.description: Adds a position to only the start point of this vector.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: Position to add to the start point

methods.name: addStart
methods.description: Adds coordinates to only the start point of this vector.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate to add to start point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate to add to start point

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate to add to start point

methods.name: addEnd
methods.description: Adds a position to only the end point of this vector.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: Position to add to the end point

methods.name: addEnd
methods.description: Adds coordinates to only the end point of this vector.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate to add to end point

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate to add to end point

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate to add to end point

methods.name: multiply
methods.description: Multiplies this vector by another Vec3D component-wise.

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: The vector to multiply by

methods.name: multiply
methods.signature: multiply(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Multiplies the start and end points of this vector by the specified coordinates.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X factor to multiply start point by

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y factor to multiply start point by

parameters.name: z1
parameters.description: Z factor to multiply start point by

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X factor to multiply end point by

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y factor to multiply end point by

parameters.name: z2
parameters.description: Z factor to multiply end point by

methods.name: scale
methods.description: Scales both the start and end points of this vector by the specified factor.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: The scaling factor

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Returns a normalized version of this vector with magnitude 1.0, maintaining the same direction.

methods.name: getPitch
methods.description: Calculates the pitch (vertical angle) of this vector in degrees. Pitch represents the angle up or down from the horizontal plane.

methods.name: getYaw
methods.description: Calculates the yaw (horizontal angle) of this vector in degrees. Yaw represents the compass direction.

methods.name: dotProduct
methods.description: Calculates the dot product of this vector with another Vec3D.

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: The vector to calculate the dot product with

methods.name: crossProduct
methods.description: Calculates the cross product of this vector with another Vec3D, resulting in a vector perpendicular to both.

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: The vector to calculate the cross product with

methods.name: reverse
methods.description: Returns a new Vec3D with the start and end points swapped, effectively reversing the vector direction.

methods.name: toMojangFloatVector
methods.description: Converts this vector to a JOML Vector3f object representing the vector's direction and magnitude.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this vector.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Compares this Vec3D with another object for equality.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: Object to compare with

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code for this vector.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares this Vec3D with another Vec3D for ordering.

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The vector to compare with
